column5: Hey guys, Just a heads up for the Rugby fans on the board.  Canada is testing their skills tomorrow against Fiji in the Rugby World Cup 2007.  They have a shot at a win as their forward pack is looking strong this tournament.  The last time Canada beat Fiji was back in 1995.  If you don't have the RWC pay per view package or Setanta sports you can still see the match on Sportsnet at 7:30am.  Hold off on going out fishing and tune in.  You should still be able to hit the water by 9:30am.  Corn Nug
